# VisualShaderNodeDeterminant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Calculates the determinant of a [Transform3D](Transform3D.md) within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translates to ``determinant(x)`` in the shader language.
